name: 308. Wandering Soul
description: Sometimes, I feel like a wandering soul, searching for my place in a world that doesn't always understand me. Living with a disability means navigating uncharted territory, learning to carve out my own path. But as I wander, I find new strength, new purpose, and a new way to define who I am.

attributes.value: pink, purple, turquoise, orange, dark blue
